mapper.select:
select b.bno,b.subject, b.userid, m.name, b.reg_date, b.readcount, b.show ,(select count(*) from dpm_comment where bno=b.bno) cnt,b.recommend from dpm_board b, dpm_member m
order by b.bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into dpm_attach (fullName, bno) values ( #{fullName}, seq_dpm_board.currval )
mapper.select: select count(*) from dpm_board b,dpm_member m

choose.when: where b.userid=m.userid and show='Y' and ${search_option} like #{keyword}
choose.otherwise: where b.userid=m.userid and show='Y' and (name like #{keyword} or subject like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} )

mapper.update: update dpm_board set readcount=readcount+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select fullName from dpm_attach where bno=#{bno} order by reg_date desc
mapper.delete: update dpm_board set show='N' where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update dpm_board set recommend = recommend+1 where bno=#{bno}
